data.headline: Senior UX Designer & Enterprise Architect
data.summary: Seasoned UX designer and enterprise architect with a passion for creating intuitive and user-centric digital experiences.

experience.title: Senior UX Designer & Enterprise Architect
bullets: Spearheaded the redesign of the company's flagship enterprise software, improving user satisfaction by 30% and reducing support tickets by 25%.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define and implement a consistent design system, streamlining the development process and enhancing brand cohesion.
Conducted user research and usability testing to identify pain points and opportunities, driving iterative improvements to the product experience.

experience.title: UX Designer & Enterprise Architect
bullets: Designed and implemented a new enterprise-wide information architecture, improving cross-functional collaboration and data accessibility.
Spearheaded the development of a mobile-first product suite, resulting in a 25% increase in user engagement and a 15% boost in customer satisfaction.

experience.title: Junior UX Designer
bullets: Contributed to the design and implementation of a new customer-facing web portal, driving a 20% increase in online sales.
Collaborated with product managers and developers to create intuitive user experiences for a range of automotive software applications.

projects.name: Enterprise Design System
projects.description: Designed and implemented a comprehensive design system for a large enterprise, ensuring consistent branding and user experiences across all digital products.

projects.name: Automotive UX Overhaul
projects.description: Led the redesign of the user experience for a suite of automotive software applications, improving usability and driving a 25% increase in customer satisfaction.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Maximilian Müller, a senior UX designer and enterprise architect, is shown in a suit and tie against a neutral background, with a friendly and confident expression.
